content:
Sure, here are ten new prompts based on the theme of miniature worlds, all using --ar 9:16:
```less
/imagine prompt: a miniature coffee shop inside a matchbox, cozy, warm-toned, mixed media, behance --ar 9:16
```

```less
/imagine prompt: a tiny alien world inside a snow globe, sci-fi, digital painting, cool-toned, artstation --ar 9:16
```

```less
/imagine prompt: a miniature library inside a birdhouse, vintage, watercolor, muted, unsplash --ar 9:16
```

```less
/imagine prompt: a miniature zen garden on a smartphone screen, minimalistic, pencil sketch, black and white, dribbble --ar 9:16
```

```less
/imagine prompt: a miniature Christmas village inside a glass bauble, festive, oil painting, warm-toned, pinterest --ar 9:16
```

```less
/imagine prompt: a miniature campsite on a pocket watch, rustic, mixed media, earthy, behance --ar 9:16
```

```less
/imagine prompt: a miniature art studio inside a seashell, creative, digital art, vibrant, artstation --ar 9:16
```

```less
/imagine prompt: a miniature enchanted forest inside a pocket mirror, magical, watercolor, pastel, unsplash --ar 9:16
```

```less
/imagine prompt: a miniature greenhouse inside a lightbulb, botanical, oil painting, warm-toned, dribbble --ar 9:16
```

```less
/imagine prompt: a miniature carnival inside a tiny suitcase, whimsical, mixed media, colorful, pinterest --ar 9:16
```
